sentences.en: A tropical storm is gaining strength in the eastern Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 在大西洋东部，一场热带风暴的风力正逐渐增强。

sentences.en: Cash alone will not make Eastern Europe's banks viable.
sentences.cn: 仅靠现金不能使东欧的银行维持下去。

sentences.en: Eastern Europe is rapidly becoming a dumping-ground for radioactive residues.
sentences.cn: 东欧迅速成为放射性残渣的倾倒场。

sentences.en: More than 100 tanks rolled into eastern Croatia.
sentences.cn: 100多辆坦克开进了克罗地亚东部。

sentences.en: One detachment pushed into the eastern suburbs towards the airfield.
sentences.cn: 一支小分队开进了东部郊区向飞机场挺进。

sentences.en: Physical and ideological barriers had come down in Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 物质和意识形态上的障碍在东欧已不复存在。

sentences.en: Spaniards are worried about German investors deserting Spain for Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人担心德国投资者放弃西班牙而转向东欧。

sentences.en: The case for aid to eastern Europe is taken as read.
sentences.cn: 援助东欧的主张被认为完全正确。

sentences.en: the eastern shore of the island
the eastern slopes of the mountain
The lake is situated at the eastern extremity of the mountain range.
The situation in Eastern Europe has changed out of all recognition.
sentences.cn: 东欧的形势经历了巨变。

sentences.en: The Soviet Union's grip on Eastern Europe loosened.
sentences.cn: 苏联对东欧的控制已经放松。

sentences.en: The wild card in the picture is Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 整个局势中的变数是东欧。

sentences.en: Where eastern Germany goes the rest will surely follow.
sentences.cn: 东德怎样做，其他地方一定会效仿。

sentences.en: Whereas West Germans drink wine, their Eastern cousins prefer Schnapps.
sentences.cn: 西德人喝葡萄酒，而他们东德的兄弟姐妹则喜欢喝杜松子酒。

words.tran_cn: 东方的；向东的；从东方来的
东方人；居住在东部或东方的人
东方人；（美国）东部地区的人

phrases.tran_cn: 马里兰大学东海岸分校
（美国）东部时间；（美国）东部时区
东正教（是与天主教、新教并立的基督教三大派别之一）

trans.tran_cn: 东方的，向东的，东方国家的
trans.tran_en: in or from the east of a country or area

trans.tran_cn: 东方人；（美国）东部地区的人
